title: Manhattan, NY
description: Visit Functional Medicine Doctor Manhattan NY, Dr Robert Kachko and team at New York Center for Integrative Health. Call (917) 477-3538
cleaned_text: Manhattan, NY Navigating your journey to better health in Manhattan, New York, with functional medicine Welcome to the New York Center for Integrative Health. At NYCIH, we understand that there are many health care providers to choose from throughout the Manhattan, Queens, the Bronx, Long Island, Staten Island, and New Jersey area. However, our clinical team, practice a comprehensive, holistic approach to care that supports sustained wellness and honors each individual we partner with and their unique needs. Moreover, our highly personalized approach to care focuses on preventing chronic conditions before they arise, rather than merely treating symptoms as they develop. In many cases, our methodology promptly and effectively reverses conditions that are present, as opposed to solely resolving those symptoms associated with many life-altering and debilitating diseases. What is functional medicine? Functional medicine represents one of the principles at the heart of NYCIH's approach to partnering with individuals as they pursue a lifetime of optimal health and well-being. Doctors who practice functional medicine appreciate that health is a function of many factors including: - Genetics - Environment - Nutrition and diet - Lifestyle - Emotional and mental well-being - Trauma - Behaviors and habits Through a truly integrative approach, our clinic offers an optimal combination of diagnostic and therapeutic modalities based on the principles of naturopathic medicine, Chinese medicine/acupuncture, mind-body medicine, and functional medicine. Through these and other services, we unlock the body's natural capacity for healing from an array of conditions — ranging from digestive disorders like IBS, chronic pain, and fatigue to depression and anxiety, insomnia, and obesity. We encourage you to contact our exceptional team at [(917) 477-3538](tel:+19174773538) to schedule an appointment at [NY Center for Integrative Health](https://www.nycintegrative.com/), Manhattan location. We conveniently provide IV therapy from our Manhattan office.
